analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya savattanti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu kammārāmo hoti, kammarato, kammārāmatamanuyutto;
analyzed: idha bhikkhave sekhaḥ bhikkhu kamma ārāmaḥ hoti kamma rataḥ kamma ārāma tam anuyuttaḥ
bhassa ārāmaḥ hoti bhassa rataḥ bhassa ārāma tama anuyuttaḥ

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayaḥ dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya savattanti

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno a parihānāya savattanti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti, na kammarato, na kammārāmatamanuyutto;
analyzed: idha bhikkhave sekhaḥ bhikkhu na kamma ārāmaḥ hoti na kamma rataḥ na kamma ārāma tam anuyuttaḥ

original: na bhassārāmo hoti, na bhassarato, na bhassārāmatamanuyutto;
analyzed: na bhassa ārāmaḥ hoti na bhassa rataḥ na bhassa ārāma tama anuyuttaḥ

original: na niddārāmo hoti, na niddārato, na niddārāmatamanuyutto.
analyzed: na niddārāmaḥ hoti na niddārataḥ na niddārāma tamanuyuttaḥ

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayaḥ dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno a parihānāya savattanti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
